Class MusicPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • javazoom.jl.player.advanced.PlaybackListener
      • MusicPlayer
  • public class MusicPlayer
extends javazoom.jl.player.advanced.PlaybackListener
    MusicPlayer class provides functionality for playing music files.
